segment.target: Operations for App-V 5.0

segment.source: Operations for App-V 5.0
segment.target: Operations for App-V 5.0

segment.source: Operations for App-V 5.0
segment.target: Operations for App-V 5.0

segment.source: This section of the App-V 5.0 Administrator’s Guide includes information about the various types of App-V 5.0 administration and operating tasks that are typically performed by an administrator.
segment.target: This section of the App-V 5.0 Administrator’s Guide includes information about the various types of App-V 5.0 administration and operating tasks that are typically performed by an administrator.

segment.source: This section also includes step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform those tasks.
segment.target: This section also includes step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform those tasks.

segment.source: Operations Information
segment.target: Operations Information

segment.source: Creating and Managing App-V 5.0 Virtualized Applications
segment.target: Creating and Managing App-V 5.0 Virtualized Applications

segment.source: Describes how to create, modify, and convert virtualized packages.
segment.target: Describes how to create, modify, and convert virtualized packages.

segment.source: Administering App-V 5.0 Virtual Applications by Using the Management Console
segment.target: Administering App-V 5.0 Virtual Applications by Using the Management Console

segment.source: Describes how to use the App-V Management console to perform tasks such as sequencing an application, changing a package, using a project template, and using a package accelerator.
segment.target: Describes how to use the App-V Management console to perform tasks such as sequencing an application, changing a package, using a project template, and using a package accelerator.

segment.source: Managing Connection Groups
segment.target: Managing Connection Groups

segment.source: Describes how connection groups enable virtualized applications to communicate with each other in the virtual environment; explains how to create, publish, and delete them; and describes how connection groups can help you better manage your virtualized applications.
segment.target: Describes how connection groups enable virtualized applications to communicate with each other in the virtual environment; explains how to create, publish, and delete them; and describes how connection groups can help you better manage your virtualized applications.

segment.source: Deploying App-V 5.0 Packages by Using Electronic Software Distribution (ESD)
segment.target: Deploying App-V 5.0 Packages by Using Electronic Software Distribution (ESD)

segment.source: Describes how to deploy App-V packages by using an ESD.
segment.target: Describes how to deploy App-V packages by using an ESD.

segment.source: Using the App-V 5.0 Client Management Console
segment.target: Using the App-V 5.0 Client Management Console

segment.source: Describes how perform client configuration tasks using the client management console.
segment.target: Describes how perform client configuration tasks using the client management console.

segment.source: Migrating from a Previous Version
segment.target: Migrating from a Previous Version

segment.source: Provides instructions for migrating to App-V 5.0 from a previous version.
segment.target: Provides instructions for migrating to App-V 5.0 from a previous version.

segment.source: Administering App-V by Using PowerShell
segment.target: Administering App-V by Using PowerShell

segment.source: Describes the set of Windows PowerShell cmdlets available for administrators performing various App-V 5.0 server tasks.
segment.target: Describes the set of Windows PowerShell cmdlets available for administrators performing various App-V 5.0 server tasks.

segment.target: Got a suggestion for App-V?

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: For App-V issues, use the App-V TechNet Forum.
segment.target: For App-V issues, use the App-V TechNet Forum.
